{{data.fullname}} {{data.email}} {{data.mobile}} {{data.academicyear}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/shared/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-dashboard', templateUrl: './student-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class StudentDashboardComponent { studentData ! :any; studentId ! :number; constructor(private apiservice:ApiService){} ngOnInit():void{ this.getAllStudents(); this.getStudent(this.studentId); } getAllStudents(){ this.apiservice.getStudents().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.studentData =res.studentDetails; console.log(res.studentDetails); }) } getStudent(id:number){ this.apiservice.getStudentById(id).subscribe((res)=>{ this.studentId = res.studentDetails; console.log(res.studentDetails); console.log(this.studentId); }) } }
